CastAway:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

CastAway:CollectBlockPower.NAME: Collect
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain block for each card you draw.

CastAway:FeedbackPower.NAME: Feedback
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal damage to a random enemy when you draw, except at Turn Start.

CastAway:CompensatePower.NAME: Compensate
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw an additional card on your turn.
